data.title: THE MASTER TOUCH-1972-VG/FN-ONE SHEET-CRIME-DRAMA-KIRK DOUGLAS-GEMMA-B VG/FN: Very Good Softcover/Paperback (1972)
data.meta_description: Softcover/Paperback - 1972 - Condition: Very Good - Starring :Kirk Douglas, Giuliano Gemma and Florinda Bolkan . Directed by: Michele Lupo Paramount-Orion 27x41 One Sheet Movie Poster. Theatrical release poster. NOT A VIDEO RELEASE, OR REPRINT! Excellent item for display. This Is original and was produced to be used for theater display and promotion. Don't miss out on this one! Condition C06/07 Folded, looks nice,light fold line tears and holes, light foxing and soiling, border chipping and creasing Check the Image! Poster held up w/magnets in photo NOT pushpins. - GRADE: VG/FN - THE MASTER TOUCH-1972-VG/FN-ONE SHEET-CRIME-DRAMA-KIRK DOUGLAS-GEMMA-B VG/FN
data.text:
About this Item

Starring :Kirk Douglas, Giuliano Gemma and Florinda Bolkan . Directed by: Michele Lupo Paramount-Orion 27x41 One Sheet Movie Poster. Theatrical release poster. NOT A VIDEO RELEASE, OR REPRINT! Excellent item for display. This Is original and was produced to be used for theater display and promotion. Don't miss out on this one! Condition C06/07 Folded, looks nice,light fold line tears and holes, light foxing and soiling, border chipping and creasing Check the Image! Poster held up w/magnets in photo NOT pushpins. - GRADE: VG/FN. Seller Inventory # U14-22-015
